summary:
An experienced Leader with a strong track record in transforming technological capabilities to achieve proactive risk management and enhanced business performance.
A Solution Architect and has experience with many blue chip clients helping deliver system adding real business value.
Expertise includes strategy development through to implementation, enterprise architecture design, IT governance and operational risk management, technology and business consultancy, assurance, and audit developed from an IT/Business career in leading companies.
Currently working on AWS Professional Cert. Currently certified in the following:
• AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional 
• AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Associate 
• AWS Certified Developer - Associate
• AWS Certified Sysops Administrator 
Having worked in various technological domain covering a variety of industries on projects from a distributed system from legacy to latest technologies.
Role covers as follow,
• Hands-on experience using compute, networking, storage, and database AWS services
• Professional experience architecting large-scale distributed systems
• Understanding of elasticity and scalability concepts
• Understanding of the AWS global infrastructure
• Understanding of network technologies as they relate to AWS
• A good understanding of all security features and tools that AWS provides and how they relate to traditional services
• A strong understanding of client interfaces to the AWS platform
• Hands-on experience with AWS deployment and management services

Core Competencies:
Cloud Computing, Solution Designing, AWS (EC2, VPC, Route 53, Lambda, RDS etc.., Azure (Administration, Azure Identity, Database), Google Cloud, Informatica, Master data Management (MDM), Salesforce & Digital Marketing

treasury_media.title: ShopAndBox
treasury_media.description: You hire a personal shopper to get your items; you can get of any kind from cosmetics, food, clothing, luxury items, and more from selected countries from ShopandBox

profile_positions.description:
An experienced Leader with a strong track record in Develop machine learning platforms for extracting actionable insights from big data. Lead design and experimentation of scalable data-driven algorithms and systems
Managing an advanced data science-powered product, Cadence, targeted towards Contextual Advertising and Customer Analytics
Developed and successfully implemented a Real-Time Credit Scoring engine algorithm based on individual's social, behavioural and financial profile
Handled app performance, user behaviour, app usage and acquisition analysis for an education-focused mobile application
Complete ad-hoc analysis and deep-dives to identify the root cause of Systematic Investment Plan cancellations for a Mutual Fund Transfer agency.
Worked efficiently with the digital team to manage resource allocation and priority lists. 
Monitoring the progress of projects and suggesting process changes where necessary to ensure projects are effectively executed and that delivery dates are met on time. 
Seeking out new ways to improve the planning and execution of projects that ensure deliverables are completed efficiently while still managing clients’ expectations and providing the necessary flexibility. 
Identifying potential project-related risk and project-related conflict and working to resolve and control it. General Management responsibility for the Forms business within Adobe's Digital Marketing Business Unit
profile_positions.title: Solutions Architect on MDM, AWS
